chunks.en: What are the solutions for Office on macOS?
I recently discovered that I still need to deal with Office files every now and then, so I have to seek an Office solution.

chunks.en: The hardware is an M2 MBA. If I don't use WPS, is it still best to get on the Office 365 train?
Are there any stable activation methods?
Actually, I don't have much reliance on Microsoft's online features.

@Tumblr #14 They are similar in nature, but the user experience is different. The user experience is almost the same as the genuine version, the operation is simple, there is no need to use third-party tools of unknown origin throughout the process, and it is a one-time solution. I don't know how you came to the conclusion that this is to seek psychological redemption.
https://massgrave.dev/office_for_mac

chunks.en: WPS or Office are both fine, but sometimes Mac files will have garbled characters when opened on Windows. Just send important files as PDFs.

chunks.en: Since you haven't completely denied WPS, just try WPS directly. I feel that WPS works fine on Mac.
I installed this one, it's free.
WPS, then block all in&out links.

chunks.en: I use OnlyOffice or LibreOffice.

chunks.en: Download the Mac installation package from the official website, and then buy a key for 10 RMB on Taobao to activate it. It's safe and reliable. Those keys seem to be from MSDN premium subscriptions.
Office can be offline or online; I won't talk about offline, there are free or paid versions.
Online versions might be good if you don't have too high requirements.
For example, Feishu and other online documents.

chunks.en: Seriously, WPS is disgusting, but it is indeed easier to use than Office on Mac.
LibreOffice or install a virtual machine with Win+MS Office.
Just buy a subscription, consider it paying for a meal for a friend within a year.
Buy a 2021 Professional Edition activation code on Taobao, bound to the account, for a few tens of RMB.
@kelvansun How to download and activate it?
WPS for safety.
@v2tex #10 This kind of activation is no different in nature from finding a free KMS activation online. They are both pirated.
ğŸ¤£ When it comes to activation, either buy it legally or get it completely for free. I don't recommend this kind of behavior of seeking psychological redemption while letting bad people profit.
@JingW There are detailed introductions online.
Buy a Microsoft 365 Family license on Jingdong, OneDrive is really good.

chunks.en: I think the experience of WPS on macOS is really better than Microsoft Office.
As for the bad things WPS does, to be honest, you are already considering piracy...
The company subscribed to Office 365, so I always use it.
I always feel that WPS is a little worse than Office, and there are always some minor problems in terms of format compatibility, but it is usable.
